snippet: Yuri Milner, the Russian entrepreneur and philanthropist, announced the Breakthrough Prize in Mathematics, the latest of his lavish cash awards to scientists.
abstract: Russian entrepreneur Yuri Milner, who established the Fundamental Physics Prize in 2012, is expanding the universe of his largess; he and Mark Zuckerberg have set up the Breakthrough Prize in Mathematics, which will begin handing out $3 million awards to mathematicians in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Yuri Milner, the Russian entrepreneur and philanthropist, announced the Breakthrough Prize in Mathematics, the latest of his lavish cash awards to scientists.

headline.main: $3 Million Prizes Will Go to Mathematicians, Too
headline.print_headline: $3 Million Prizes Will Go To Mathematicians, Too
